summary: Dolph Springer wakes up one morning to realize he has lost the love of his life, his dog, Paul. During his quest to get Paul (and his life) back, Dolph radically changes the lives of others -- risking his sanity all the while.
cast: Jack Plotnick|Eric Judor|Alexis Dziena|Steve Little|William Fichtner|Regan Burns|Mark Burnham|Arden Myrin|Maile Flanagan|Todd Giebenhain|Barry Alan Levine|Gregorio|LeShay N. Tomlinson|Price Carson|Gary Valentine|Charley Koontz|Jared Farid Ward|Nealla Gordon|Gregory Bernard|David Nicolas|Alex Ridha|Flying Lotus|Bob Jennings|Cole Jensen|Max Nicolas|Tony Ruiz|T. Scott Keiner|Josef Lieck|Pete Dicecco|Ian J. Putnam|Bo Barrett|Kuma|Rebecca Thompson
title: Wrong
